channel.title: Mercury mail xampp
channel.description: Ok, two questions, One, if i set up mercury mail on my pc, can I use that as my email, like hiaburi@myip.com? and if so, Two, how do I make it work, ive never been able to get mercury mail working.

item.title: Mercury mail xampp
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Ok, two questions, One, if i set up mercury mail on my pc, can I use that as my email, like hiaburi@myip.com? and if so, Two, how do I make it work, ive never been able to get mercury mail working.
